author: FOCUS Online
description: Sie werden von ihren Followern gefeiert wie Superstars. YouTube-Blogger präsentieren nicht nur sich vor der Kamera, sondern auch jede Menge Produkte. Ob Lipgloss, Badeschaum oder das neuste Paar Schuhe: Auf der Video-Plattform gelten für Produktplatzierungen strenge Werberegeln, die die Blogger geschickt umgehen.
title: YouTube: Sechsstellige Strafe: So umgehen YouTuber wie Bibi Heinicke das Schleichwerbungsverbot

author: Justin L. Mack
description: Indiana University students Christian Perry and Noah Maxwell  produce The Christian and Noah Show on YouTube.
title: Students survive 48 hours in Walmart without going insane or getting arrested

author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/kellie-scott/6830306, http://www.abc.net.au/news/lucia-stein/7093484
description: Fake news circulators seeking social media fame use the Manchester bombing to launch false posts about gunmen, dead YouTube stars and missing children.
title: Missing kids and other 'cruel' fake news circulates after Manchester attack

author: Rachel Kaser
description:
Microsoft's livestreaming service is now Mixer, the Site Formerly Known as Beam.

In case you forgot about it, Mixer/Beam is Microsoft's answer to Twitch and YouTube Gaming, a livestreaming ...
title: Microsoft’s Beam becomes Mixer, gets a facelift

author: Rachel Kaser
description:

Three of the five trailers focus on in-game characters, ...
title: Ubisoft drops five Far Cry 5 trailers, reveals release date

description: The Company Bitmovin, a YCombinator company, is the industry-leading video encoding, player and analytics provider and is a fast growing privately owned company located in San Francisco, CA and Klagenfurt, Austria. The company was founded by the co-creators of the MPEG-DASH video streaming standard that is used today by companies like Netflix and YouTube and …
title: Performance Marketing Manager - Bitmovin

description: Herr K. lernt Bibi kennen. Als sein Sohn ihm die damit verbundene Influencer-Szene erklärt, merkt er, dass sein Bild von Traumkarrieren längst überholt ist. Schnell träumt er selbst vom verpassten Youtube-Imperium.
title: Der moderne Mann: Wie wird man Influencer?
